A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow\,   I dont get all these negative reviews....   this was a really good movie and I dont want to get into a review with spoilers so Im not going to go into details defending this movie but I have seen it twice and while I dont think this is a perfect movie\, it is a SOLID next chapter in the Star Wars saga....  is it what I would have written\,  well no....  but I can tell that the people who made the movie understand Star Wars and I think that they did a good job and am I excited for whats to come!  May the Force Be With You!
